Does the UV-Vis spectrum of Ag⊂Re3-MOF retain the characteristic LSPR features of the Ag core?
Is the photocatalytic activity of Ag⊂Re3-MOF enhanced compared to Re3-MOF alone?
What is the effect of increasing ReTC density in Ren-MOFs on their photocatalytic activity?
data.answer: Increasing ReTC density in Ren-MOFs initially increases their photocatalytic activity, but beyond a certain point, the activity decreases.

data.question: What happens to the photocatalytic activity of Ren-MOFs when there is no ReTC in the MOF layer?
data.answer: There is no photocatalytic activity observed.

data.question: What is the role of the enhanced electromagnetic field surrounding plasmonic silver nanocubes in photocatalysis?
data.answer: It significantly increases the photocatalytic activity of MOF-coated nanoparticle photocatalysts.
